name: Growl. Die. Meow.
description:
This game is about being different animals and flying, running, jumping, and swimming over obstacles, and seeing how far you can make it before you die and start again as a new animal. 

This game was created for the Utah Indie Game Jam 2021 (48 hour game jam) with the theme "Reincarnation".

Thanks to Arianna, my sister, for the art.
